DOC.brief_summary: The goal study formative research lead ultimately development computer-based system call Tailored Information Diet Exercise TIDE short . TIDE target energy balance behavior prevent onset obesity child . The system use physician parents/primary care giver pediatric primary care practice aim improve parent-pediatrician interaction related counsel anticipatory guidance energy balance behavior . The aim study develop one-two page , paper-pencil proxy questionnaire use query parent child wait room ass topic area related energy balance behavior ( EBB ) . The questionnaire refer energy balance behavior questionnaire ( EBB-Q ) . This require focus group , cognitive testing questionnaire , survey administration .
